title.narrative: Livestock: Agricultural Sector Development Programme - Livestock: Support for Pastoral and Agro-Pastoral Development

description.narrative: The overall goal of the programme is to reduce poverty, improve food security and increase the incomes of communities that mainly depend on livestock for their livelihoods. Specific objectives are to: improve the livelihoods of the poorest agropastoralists and pastoralists; strengthen the capacity of livestock communities, both institutionally and technically; enhance the delivery of livestock development services to smallholders; improve marketing infrastructures and systems for livestock products; and strengthen national and local government institutions to provide services to the livestock subsector.

name.narrative: Livestock: Agricultural Sector Development Programme - Livestock: Support for Pastoral and Agro-Pastoral Development

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
